mapper.select: select free_b_seq,user_email,user_name,free_b_addr,free_b_sendrecieve,free_b_location,free_b_title,free_b_content,free_b_date,free_b_hit from foot_free_booking where free_b_manager = 1 order by free_b_seq desc
select user_name from foot_user where user_email = #{user_email}
select data.* from (select free_b_seq,free_b_title,free_b_date from foot_free_booking where free_b_seq > #{free_b_seq} and free_b_manager = 1 order by free_b_seq asc) data where rownum = 1
select data.* from (select free_b_seq,free_b_title,free_b_date from foot_free_booking where free_b_seq < #{free_b_seq} and free_b_manager = 1 order by free_b_seq desc) data where rownum = 1
